question: Comet Hale-Bopp orbits the sun every 55 years. Carl's father saw the Comet when he was 39 years old. Carl saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his father was when he saw the Comet. How old was Carl when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Carl saw the Comet for the second time when he was 39 years * 2= <<39*2=78>>78 years old.
Comet Hale-Bopp can be seen every 55 years, so Carl saw the comet for the first time when he was 78 years - 55 years = <<78-55=23>>23 years old.
#### 23
